Uses of Interface
org.microbean.helm.maven.ReleaseTestListener

    • Uses of ReleaseTestListener in org.microbean.helm.maven

      Classes in org.microbean.helm.maven that implement ReleaseTestListener 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractReleaseTestListener
      A ReleaseTestListener that logs the Tiller.TestReleaseResponseOrBuilder associated with a ReleaseTestEvent.
      Methods in org.microbean.helm.maven that return ReleaseTestListener 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ReleaseTestListener[] TestReleaseMojo.getReleaseTestListeners()
      Invokes the TestReleaseMojo.getReleaseTestListenersList() method and converts its return value to an array.
      Methods in org.microbean.helm.maven that return types with arguments of type ReleaseTestListener 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      List<ReleaseTestListener> TestReleaseMojo.getReleaseTestListenersList()
      Returns the List of ReleaseTestListeners whose elements will be notified when the tests complete.
      Methods in org.microbean.helm.maven with parameters of type ReleaseTestListener 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void TestReleaseMojo.addReleaseTestListener(ReleaseTestListener listener)
      Adds a ReleaseTestListener that will be notified when the tests complete.
      void TestReleaseMojo.removeReleaseTestListener(ReleaseTestListener listener)
      Removes a ReleaseTestListener from this TestReleaseMojo.
      Method parameters in org.microbean.helm.maven with type arguments of type ReleaseTestListener 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void TestReleaseMojo.setReleaseTestListenersList(List<ReleaseTestListener> releaseTestListeners)
      Installs the List of ReleaseTestListeners whose elements will be notified when the tests complete.
